添加了几种作物和冰激凌到游戏中



安装方法：

客户端：
去官方forge网站，并下载forge的安装程序
打开安装程序，在你的Minecraft自行安装
改变你游戏启动器配置文件， '1 .6 .X forge“ ，开始你的游戏。
如果你没有错误。关闭的Minecraft然后拖放mod文件放到MODS的文件夹中。 （请确保你打开你从我这里下载的文件。文件里面应该有德语和英语 。去文件夹内选择你的语言。）【我这里下载的只有英语】

文件夹里将有一个“服务器用和一个正常的Minecraft ”选择你所需要的，并把它放到MOD文件夹内。的minecraft文件夹（你进minecraft文件夹和这个代码' ％ APPDATA ％ “ 。
现在可以享受游戏了！

服务端：
这与客户端的安装方法有些不同
用普遍的forge（minecraft不安装）。 
打开你的Minecraft的server.jar，把东西拖进去
这一次不要删除META-IN！！不然你会崩溃。 
启动服务器，让它加载。关闭它！那么你应该有一个名为“mod”的新文件夹
和基友玩吧！

kingstone文件夹里的icecreamNetwork大概是服务器用，icecream大概是客户端用

翻译我有点不确定OTZ
这里是原文


For client:

1, Go to the official Forge website and download Forge installer.

2, Open Forge installer, and it should atomatic, install itself in your minecraft.


3, Change in your minecraft launcher the profile to '1.6.x Forge' and start your minecraft.

4, If you have no errors, you done everything right! Then close minecraft and drag and drop my mod file into the mods folder. (Be sure you opened the file You downloaded from me. There should be to files inside (German and English). Choose your language and go inside of the folder.

5, There will be a 'Server and a normal minecraft' be. Choose what you have. Take the .zip achive and put it inside the mod folde rin your .minecraft folder (you get into the .minecraft folder with this code '%appdata%'.

6,Now start minecraft again!

7, Enjoy the awsome mod!




For server:

1, this is a little bit differnt to the client!

2, take minecraft forger universal this time (not the installer).

3, open your minecraft server.jar and put everything from the forge achive inside of it!

4, Please by the love of god. Don't delete the META-Inf this time!
Or you will crash so to death.

5, start your server, let it load. Close it! Then you should have a new folder section named 'mod'. Then go step by step from number 4-5 above.

6, Have fun with your friends!

replies.txt_content: 冰激凌 我最喜欢的一种食物
等等，香蕉怎么长在地上！这不科学
